searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState.new(value: easyStateValue) → EasyState EasyState is a state container class for all kinds of state management.

searchDocs.title: Get​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:Get() → easyStateValue Gets the current value of the state.

searchDocs.title: GetOriginal​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:GetOriginal() → easyStateValue Gets the original value of the state.

searchDocs.title: Set​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:Set(value: easyStateValue) → () Sets the state to a new value.

searchDocs.title: Subscribe​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:Subscribe(callback: subscriber) → subcriberID Subscribes a callback to the state.

searchDocs.title: SubscribeUntil​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:SubscribeUntil( callback: subscriber, untilValue: easyStateValue ) → subcriberID Subscribes a callback to the state until a certain value is reached.

searchDocs.title: GetSubscriptionStatus​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:GetSubscriptionStatus(subscriberID: subcriberID) → subscriptionState Gets the status of a subscriber by its ID.

searchDocs.title: UnsubscribeUntil​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:UnsubscribeUntil( subscriberID: subcriberID, untilValue: easyStateValue, dropSubscriberAfter: number ) → () Unsubscribes a subscriber until a certain value is reached.

searchDocs.title: UnsubscribeAll​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:UnsubscribeAll() → () Unsubscribes all subscribers. Suspended subscribers will still be re-subscribed if their condition is met.

searchDocs.title: Reset​
searchDocs.content: </> EasyState:Reset() → () Resets the state to its original value.
